content: * this is the ad-free printable version of this pattern you can find the free crochet pattern at theturtletrunk com and video tutorial on youtube * the country cottage basket is a beautifully texture crochet basket that s easy to create it features an amazing texture that s made from only 2 crochet stitches it s sturdy and won t flop over and includes 2 side handles difficulty- advanced beginner finished size 9 5 x 9 5 width and height can be adjusted to be any size written in us terms supplies needed - 2 strands of bulky 5 weight yarn held together i used lion brand yarn hue + me or you can sub for 1 strand of super bulky 6 weight yarn or 4 strands of medium 4 weight yarn - 8 00mm l crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors pattern includes - gauge pattern - reference photos - special stitch instructions - link to free + full video tutorial - detailed written instructions to create a striped basket you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
